data.description:
Are you prepared for the ultimate showdown in the world of rhythm boxing?

Here are some of the features that you'd find in our game:

- Custom Songs Support: Play to your favorite songs.

- World Bosses: Collaborate with players worldwide to take on epic bosses with awesome loot.

- Cross-Platform Leaderboards: Compete and showcase your skills globally.

- Power-Ups: Boost your points but be ready for the extra challenge.

- Constant Updates: Expect regular and exciting game enhancements.

- Arcade Mode, EPIC Gloves, Free songs, Pet Dragons, and much more!

Ready for the ultimate rhythm boxing experience?

Let's BOX to the BEAT!

changelog.change_log:
"Box To The Beat VR V41"

-Added new light show environment
-Uppercuts and hook collisions are more lenient now
-Score multiplier increased so that longer combos are more rewarding
-Volume 3 is now in the game, with a new song every week
-Dynamic mode, fast mode and beast mode all add 10% bonus scores now
-Adjusted all existing songs for better flow

"Box To The Beat VR V39":

Custom Songs Integration: Players can now enjoy custom songs in the game by placing them in the following directory: "Android/data/com.KhosoufStudio.BoxToTheBeat/files/UnrealGame/BoxToTheBeat/BoxToTheBeat/Saved/CustomSongs/"
